title: How a change to YouTube’s AI could make the site even more addictive
text:
Google researchers are proposing tweaks to the YouTube algorithm that could make the video streaming site more addictive by offering even more targeted content to its viewers.

In a recent research paper, the company says that it hopes the changes will also help reduce the ‘implicit bias’ of the current algorithm, which has come under fire for leading viewers to extremist videos.

However, some experts that have reviewed the proposals believe that the changes have the potential to further foster extremist communities on the website.
